profile:
Welcome to Easy Pools

Does looking out at your underwhelming backyard fill you with ideas of the extraordinary space it could be?
A beautiful setting to entertain friends, a private oasis for relaxation and rejuvenation, a place the kids never tire of! You want to make the most of your property – and your free time – but when it comes to pool designs and pool landscaping, maybe you’re not sure where to begin. We encourage you to make the most of your time by taking an hour of ours. Start with just an hour talking with us to get an idea of the real possibilities for your space. Customizing your whole pool experience is something we’re passionate about!

About Us:

IT’S A MATTER OF TIME.
We’re all so short on time today. We need to make the most of the downtime we have with unforgettably great experiences.
At Easy Pools we understand that, and we know that having a beautiful backyard space with a fabulous pool is one of the best ways to create those great times – right outside your own door.
We’ve found that we can help you achieve that ideal space by giving fully of our time, from planning to completion, to ensure you end up with a pool setting that will add real value to your home, and your home life.

That means you can feel free to ask as many questions as you want, whenever you want – we’ll have all the time you need. It also means that during the construction phase we take our time to deliver superb workmanship. No cutting corners. No details left undone. Ensuring your needs are met by spending our own time wisely is how we work. It’s what makes us different.

For over ten years, Easy Pools  has been creating beautiful properties for homeowners in the GTA, including landscapes, stonework, patios, outdoor structures and pools. 

Over the years, we’ve perfected our project management skills so that your projects are not only finished on time and on budget, but client courtesy is core. There is always a dedicated manager to stay in touch with you, promptly answering calls or meeting to discuss the project. Staff always operate in a safe, conscientious and friendly manner.

We appreciate you taking the time to find out about us and we hope you find what you need. If you’d like to discuss the possibility of adding a pool to your home, we would love to hear from you.

Our Services Include:
*Swimming Pool Features: vanishing edges, expanding underwater steps, baja steps for lounging, customzied chapes, naturalized surroundings, integrated waterfalls and waterspouts, integrated or freestanding spa pools
